entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
